channel.title: Comments on: YouBloom! – a new Irish web2.0 company – backed by Bob Geldof

item.title: By: Peter Kitch
item.dc:creator: Peter Kitch
item.description:
In two weeks keep an eye out for the newest social networking child to join the fray. Yes, I work for youbloom.com as a product manager. (hehe. i work from home. sweet)
I have been hired to develop a more self aware online culture through the use of digital and tangible rewards simplicity. Think: incentives that encourage prudent participation.
We can discover what truly works best, for EVERYONE!
Check out www.youbloom.com and sign up to be notified once we open the community to the public next week!!!
Do what brings you joy and have fun doing it!
-Peter Kitch
item.content:encoded:
In two weeks keep an eye out for the newest social networking child to join the fray. Yes, I work for youbloom.com as a product manager. (hehe. i work from home. sweet)

I have been hired to develop a more self aware online culture through the use of digital and tangible rewards simplicity. Think: incentives that encourage prudent participation.

We can discover what truly works best, for EVERYONE!

Check out http://www.youbloom.com/ and sign up to be notified once we open the community to the public next week!!!

Do what brings you joy and have fun doing it!

-Peter Kitch
